0: The restaurant is ok nothing outstanding but not bad either
Wait staff in hotel restaurants and bars very surly and unfriendly
This was not a big deal for us since we never ate at the hotel but I could see it being a problem for people who want to eat at the restaurants in the loby The water at the hotel remains an issue
Most meals were buffet and rather monotonous
The service at Blue Bar and at breakfast is bad even compared with the standard of the region
The only time when music was played was during New Years night and Friday night at the Xquisit restaurant
It does not have an executive or club lounge but ask for full breakfast buffet credit as a platinum member

Where soldiers may have mustered or powder and cannon shot may have been stored almost 200 years ago shops and restaurants now stand with their doors open ready to sell you everything from steak and ribs to a burger from a stropwafel to sushi from beer to ice cream to a curaçao keepsake to jewelry
We had to wait quite long for cofe tea at breakfast we had to ask for new towels for our room several times and when our rental car broke down no one from budget rental car located in the hotel
1: Lot of good restaurants in a Town with excellent food and fear price
The beach bar and beach area is a very nice and quiet place away from the rest of the tourist that are from the ships
Ruth at the bar is a real sweetheart and we enjoyed chatting with her
Great rooms and very good breakfast
I was told that with the package I purchased that I had meals all included
Especially love the ocean side beach and bar
Alysa hostess breakfast was the cutest most personable and fun person
Happy hour at the beachside bar is 6 7pm and is 2 for 1 on a good selection of spirits

The other staff that you will want to have on your side is for your Breakfast in the morning is Sydney and Staff they will make sure that what ever you want to eat that is an island dish Sydney will make sure that the Chef Tamara will prepare it for you
Special mention to Ronald who greets guests with a gentle smile to Angela in the pool restaurant and Jason in room service
